source.query: SELECT p.product_id as source_product_key , p.name as product_name , p.product_number , c.name as category , sc.name as subcategory , p.standard_cost , p.row_number as stage_product_row_number , p.batch_id as stage_product_batch_id FROM stage_product p LEFT OUTER JOIN stage_productsubcategory sc ON p.product_subcategory_id = sc.product_subcategory_id LEFT OUTER JOIN stage_productcategory c ON sc.product_category_id = c.product_category_id WHERE p.batch_id > ${batch_id}
